title: SPY + Jeremy McGrath + Keep A Breast
description:
On September 10, 2011, 7x AMA Supercross Champion Jeremy McGrath's wife Kim was diagnosed with breast cancer. Jeremy explains his experience dealing with the disease as a husband and father and how the Keep A Breast Foundation creates awareness about the disease and empowers people to get checked out.

Keep A Breast Foundation VP of Marketing Kimmy McAtee discusses the importance of the foundation and its mission to help eradicate breast cancer by exposing young people to methods of prevention, early detection and support through events, educational programs and fundraising efforts.

Help support the KAB Foundation by purchasing a pair of the SPY + Keep A Breast Whip MX goggles. $3 from each goggle go to help fund Keep A Breast programs. Grab one or two while you can! For more information visit keep-a-breast.org.
